algorithm:
New algorithm description: The new algorithm calculates the scores for bin assignment by multiplying the element-wise ratio of the item size to each bin capacity by the ratio of the maximum bin capacity to the total rest capacities of the bins. The scores are then sorted in descending order.

New algorithm implementation in Python:

```
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    total_rest_capacity = np.sum(bins)

    # Calculate the ratio of the item size to each bin capacity
    ratio = item / bins

    # Calculate the ratio of the maximum bin capacity to the total rest capacities of the bins
    max_to_total_ratio = max_capacity / total_rest_capacity

    # Calculate the scores as the product of the ratios
    scores = ratio * max_to_total_ratio

    # Sort the scores in descending order
    sorted_scores = np.sort(scores)[::-1]

    return scores
